mapper.select: SELECT cash_no as cashNo, cash_kind as cashKind, category_name as categoryName, cash_price as cashPrice, cash_place as cashPlace, cash_memo as cashMemo FROM cash WHERE member_id =#{memberId} AND cash_date =#{cashDate} ORDER BY cash_no ASC

SELECT (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cash_price),0) FROM cash WHERE member_id=#{memberId} AND cash_kind='수입' AND cash_date=#{cashDate}) - (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cash_price),0) FROM cash WHERE member_id=#{memberId} AND cash_kind='지출' AND cash_date=#{cashDate}) FROM dual
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cash( cash_no, member_id, cash_date, cash_kind, category_name, cash_price, cash_place, cash_memo )VALUES( #{cashNo}, #{memberId}, #{cashDate}, #{cashKind}, #{categoryName}, #{cashPrice}, #{cashPlace}, #{cashMemo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cash SET cash_kind =#{cashKind}, category_name =#{categoryName}, cash_price =#{cashPrice}, cash_place =#{cashPlace}, cash_memo =#{cashMemo} WHERE member_id =#{memberId}
